name: Vo Thanh Nha
about:

experiences.description:
Today we have a team of bright, talented recruiters that give the firm a balance of experience and breadth of in-depth exposure to the various industries in: administration, finance, manufacturing, engineering, logistics, biosciences and other service sectors

experiences.description:
- Be responsible for recruiting base on the requirement of the Board of Management: Managers, Assistant managers, General Supervisors, Supervisors
- Organize and assign jobs for HR and Admin staffs make sure that Admin services and all allowance, policies meet the demand of the employer and employees. 
- Updating the internal labor regulations, salary statue, collective labor agreement to register with the Labor and Social Welfare service.
- Double check with C & B supervisor to provide good policies for the employees: correct salary, social insurances, labor contracts, maternity allowance, sick allowance, unemployment allowance, PIT, …
- Train and instruct for HR staffs to help them develop their strong points and improve their weak points to work better.
